lmdp.grounding.states.Effect module¶

Effect Class:

Effect Expression implementation. args:

-Boolean expresion in SxA to determine if the effect is applicable -Effect Expression among:

  • List of States

  • Predicate

  • Dictionary of Factor name to expression

author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez (rrs@brown.edu) date: January 2021

lmdp.grounding.states.NextStateGroundingClass module¶

Next State Grounding class

  • Wrapper for State Grounding that allows to ground names

to the ‘next state’ of a transition tuple (s, s’)

author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez date: January 2021

class lmdp.grounding.states.PredicateClass.Predicate(boolean_fun, name=None, operator=None, operands=None)¶

Bases: rlang.src.lmdp.grounding.GroundingClass.Grounding, rlang.src.lmdp.grounding.booleans.BooleanFunClass.BooleanExpression

and_(other)¶

Represents the logical operator ‘and’ to join two boolean expressions

Parameters

other (Expression) – any BooleanExpression, Expression, or bool

Raises

other.__name__ – if other is not a boolean, BooleanExpression or Expression, raise other.__name__()

Returns

fun is a partial function that applies _conj to self and other;

domain is the combination of the domains of self and other; operator is ‘and’; operands is a list of self and other

Return type

BooleanExpression

counter = 2¶
not_()¶

Represents the logic operator “not” to negate an Boolean Expression

Returns

fun is a partial function that applies _neg to self;

domain is self.domain(); operator is ‘not’; operands is a list of self

Return type

BooleanExpression

or_(other)¶

Represents the logical operator ‘or’ to join two boolean expressions

Parameters

other (Expression) – any BooleanExpression, Expression, or bool

Raises

other.__name__ – if other is not a boolean, BooleanExpression or Expression, raise other.__name__()

Returns

fun is a partial function that applies _disj to self and other;

domain is the combination of the domains of self and other; operator is ‘or’; operands is a list of self and other

Return type

BooleanExpression

lmdp.grounding.states.StateClass module¶

This wrapper creates a flexible factory for State Objects that can be initialized for the particular class of MDP

author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez (rrs@brown.edu) date: v0 January 2021

lmdp.grounding.states.StateGroundingClass module¶

State Functions:

  • State Factor

  • State Features

N.B.: These classes assume Simple RL MDP States, whose underlying data structure is a numpy array.
